title: Duty Bound Desire: The Sheikh's Forced Marriage
description: Lose yourself in this spellbinding tale of duty, desire, scandal and the power of love. The betrayal of his first marriage still stings and the reason Crown Prince Nabil has vowed never to marry again. However, his father’s ailing health means he must now secure the throne and be the strong sheikh his nation needs. To do this, he will need a suitable wife, one with a clear understanding of what an arranged marriage means. She must not expect love for he has none left to give. Princess Yasmin wants her independence but her nation is on the brink of war and only a political alliance can save her people. In the process, she will watch everything she’s ever wanted slip from her grasp along with her freedom. She will sacrifice her dreams, as failure to do so will result in the unthinkable, however, she vows to never be her husband’s subordinate. From the onset, the raw heat and passion that sizzles between the two of them stuns him and despite it being a pleasant surprise, it cannot ever be mistaken for true connection. Nabil is adamant their business-like arrangement must be adhered to, and Yasmin should expect nothing more from him.As time goes on, the shiekh realises he will have to face his past in order to save his marriage and secure his future.
author: Jennifer  Jansen
